docs.title: Custom Objects
docs.description: Objects are structures that allow you to store data (records, attributes, and values) specific to an organization. Twenty provides both standard and custom objects.

docs.title: App Tooltip
docs.description: A brief message that displays additional information when a user interacts with an element.

docs.title: Checkmark
docs.description: Represents a successful or completed action.

docs.title: Chip
docs.description: A visual element that you can use as a clickable or non-clickable container with a label, optional left and right components, and various styling options to display labels and tags.

docs.title: Icons
docs.description: A list of icons used throughout our app.

docs.title: Soon Pill
docs.description: A small badge or "pill" to indicate something is coming soon.

docs.title: Tag
docs.description: Component to visually categorize or label content.

docs.title: Progress Bar
docs.description: Indicates progress or countdown and moves from right to left.

docs.title: Block Editor
docs.description: Uses a block-based rich text editor from BlockNote to allow users to edit and view blocks of content.

docs.title: Buttons
docs.description: A list of buttons and button groups used throughout the app.

docs.title: Checkbox
docs.description: Used when a user needs to select multiple values from several options.

docs.title: Color Scheme
docs.description: Color Scheme Card

docs.title: Icon Picker
docs.description: A dropdown-based icon picker that allows users to select an icon from a list.

docs.title: Image Input
docs.description: Allows users to upload and remove an image.

docs.title: Radio
docs.description: Used when users may only choose one option from a series of options.

docs.title: Select
docs.description: Allows users to pick a value from a list of predefined options.

docs.title: Text
docs.description: Text Input

docs.title: Toggle
docs.description: <SandpackEditor

docs.title: Breadcrumb
docs.description: Renders a breadcrumb navigation bar.

docs.title: Links
docs.description: Contact Link

docs.title: Menu Item
docs.description: A versatile menu item designed to be used in a menu or navigation list.

docs.title: Navigation Bar
docs.description: Renders a navigation bar that contains multiple NavigationBarItem components.

docs.title: Step Bar
docs.description: Displays progress through a sequence of numbered steps by highlighting the active step. It renders a container with steps, each represented by the Step component.
